name: VO Person Provile
description: voPerson is both a set of recommendations and an ldap attribute schema (object class), intended to provide a common reference point for attribute management within a Virtual Organization (VO)

attributes.name: voPersonAffiliation
attributes.description: An organization-specific affiliation, intended to parallel but expand upon eduPersonAffiliation, allowing for finer grained descriptions of affiliations (such as graduate student, undergraduate, research, PI, administrator, etc).

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonAffiliation. Example: gradstudent

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior user affiliation, no longer current

subAttributes.name: role
subAttributes.description: Denotes a role specific affiliation if present (otherwise overall person affiliation)

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: Denotes affiliation as asserted by source system

attributes.name: voPersonApplicationPassword
attributes.description: An application specific password, corresponding roughly with the person object class userPassword attribute, but constrained to one application or one cluster of applications. The use of the app- attribute option is required to denote the target application. Multiple values for the same app are permitted when encoded in different formats.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the password. Example: {bcrypt}$2y$10$NCAEogo6Q1boibEUAshANeR.Xy5ruAuEgF9us5pDvC.Ujo9kaiwY.

subAttributes.name: app
subAttributes.description: Name of the app to denote the target application. Example: wiki

attributes.name: voPersonApplicationUID
attributes.description: An application specific identifier, corresponding roughly with the inetOrgPerson uid, but constrained to one application or one cluster of applications.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonApplicationUID. Example: plee@myvo.org

subAttributes.name: app
subAttributes.description: Name of the app to denote the target application. Example: wiki

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior user identifier, no longer current

attributes.name: voPersonAuthorName
attributes.description: The formal author name of the subject, suitable for publication purposes.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonAuthorName. Example: P Q Lee

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior author name, no longer current

attributes.name: voPersonCertificateDN
attributes.description: The Subject Distinguished Name of an X.509 certificate held by the person.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonCertificateDN. Example: P Q Lee

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes a prior Author

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: Identifies source to correlate with voPersonCertificateIssuerDN. Example: cert1

attributes.name: voPersonCertificateIssuerDN
attributes.description: The Subject Distinguished Name of the X.509 certificate issuer. The use of the scope attribute option is required to denote the correlating certificate.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonCertificateIssuerDN. Example: CN=CILogon Basic CA 1, O=CILogon, C=US, DC=cilogon, DC=org

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: Identifies source to correlate with voPersonCertificateDN. Example: cert1

attributes.name: voPersonExternalAffiliation
attributes.description: An organization-specific affiliation as per voPersonAffiliation, but obtained from an external organization, and therefore scoped.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonExternalAffiliation. Example: gradstudent@yourvo.org

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior user affiliation, no longer current

attributes.name: voPersonExternalID
attributes.description: An explicitly scoped identifier for a person, typically as issued by an external authentication service such as a federated or social identity provider.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonExternalID. Example: plee@university.edu

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior external identifier, no longer current

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonExternalID. Example: plee@university.edu

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior unique identifier (perhaps deprecated as a result of a record merge), no longer current.

attributes.name: voPersonPolicyAgreement
attributes.description: The URL describing a policy that has been agreed to by the person identified by this record.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: The URL to to policy. Example: https://myvo.org/policies/acceptable-use

subAttributes.name: time
subAttributes.description: Denotes time the policy was agreed to

subAttributes.name: version
subAttributes.description: Denotes versions of the policy that were agreed to

attributes.name: voPersonScopedAffiliation
attributes.description: Used for transport only, this attribute maps voPersonAffiliation when used across the wire. The resulting value should be stored in voPersonExternalAffiliation by the receiving entity.

attributes.name: voPersonSoRID
attributes.description: An implicitly scoped identifier for a person, typically as issued by a system of record. This is a 'behind the scenes' or system-centric identifier, and generally cannot be used for authentication.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonSoRID. Example: E0074700

subAttributes.name: prior
subAttributes.description: Denotes prior external identifier, no longer current

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: Denotes source system. Example: hrml

attributes.name: voPersonStatus
attributes.description: The person's status within the organization. A set of standard values are defined, though the values of this attribute are not constrained to them

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonStatus

subAttributes.name: role
subAttributes.description: Denotes a role specific status if present (otherwise overall person status)

attributes.name: voPersonToken
attributes.description: An identifier for an authentication token associated with the person, typically a token serial number.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonToken. Example SERIAL12345

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: Type of the voPersonToken. Example: totp

attributes.name: voPersonVerifiedEmail
attributes.description: An email address of the same definition as the inetOrgPerson mail attribute (RFC 4524), with the additional characteristic that the address has been verified as being controlled by the subject of the record.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Value of the voPersonVerifiedEmail. Example: user@university.edu

subAttributes.name: preferred
subAttributes.description: Denotes the preferred verified email address for the record

attributes.name: voPersonSshPublicKey
attributes.description: SSH public key(s) of the user
